name: Star Cross: Stellar Edition
description:
In an age before the beginning of the universe, a long dead civilization engineered a cure for their own end of days in the form of the Celestial End, a device with the power to remake all of existence into one singular visage.  By the nature of the device, it could not be destroyed, so the progenitors of the new universe safely tucked it safely away, so that no creature foolhardy enough could make use of the legendary artifact, the Celestial End.

Star Cross: Stellar Edition is a graphical improvement on the original title released on Xbox Live Indie Games.  This edition works on PC, provided it contains the XNA 3.1 Redistributable (provided below) and the .net framework.

The base game of Star Cross has the following features.

  • 2.5D graphics
  • 4+ worlds
  • 30+ enemies
  • 4 playable characters
  • Elemental system
  • 8+ hours of game time
  • 3 hour secret dungeon

The Stellar Edition includes a graphical overhaul of the menu designs and character face graphics.  It also contains bugfixes and runs as a full-screen application.
